ComicInfo.Summary: Battleground Earth: Bruce and General Ross are taken to Freehold, which is now run by the Troyjan. The Troyjan reveal that they resurrected General Ross. Armageddon attempts to use the Hulk's energies to resurrect his son, Trauma. Rick and Marlo fight about Rick's paralysis.
